==== lateBoundAssignmentDeclarationSupport7.js (0 errors) ====
    const _sym = Symbol();
    const _str = "my-fake-sym";
    
    function F() {
    }
    F[_sym] = "ok";
    F[_str] = "ok";
    module.exports.F = F;
    module.exports.S = _sym;
